title: GrantsDAO Quarterly Top-up - Motion
body:
As a follow-up to [this forum post](https://forum.mstable.org/t/proposal-grants-dao-fundraising-and-recruitment/483), and in line with this [previous proposal](https://snapshot.org/#/mstablegovernance.eth/proposal/QmfMAGjY7J8fM8jHTEcAkVsmyRdKpJ6mmZHCzc2F39RCst) from the GrantsDAO, it is hereby motioned to follow-up on and honour their quarterly funding request to send 100,000 MTA to the mStable GrantsDAO for Q3 of 2021.

Once successfully resolved by public vote, if the full amount of MTA is less than 50% utilized in that particular quarter, then no top-up of MTA is needed for the following quarter. 

This motion also wishes to standardize the process and seeks to include in the public proposal the clause that unless some drastic or unforeseen change happens to the GrantsDAO, no further public vote is needed for its ongoing funding. This would mean that the mStable Funding subDAO will be empowered to grant this amount on a quarterly basis to the GrantsDAO when a top-up is necessary.

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and snapshot page?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
